main event: A sighting of a reddish white circular object traveling in a straight line over Solano County, California on April 20, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported at approximately 0930 hours from a county home., The object was moving from the northwest to the southwest horizon., The sighting lasted around 5 minutes., The altitude and speed of the object were not estimated., No physical trace or landing was reported during the investigation.
witness description: The witness was at his county home and reported observing the object in the sky.
